bug.summary: Bug when Installing requirement.txt and apex on CoLab
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. When I install the requirement.txt follow by apex. The apex is failed to be installed and the cuda cannot be used. But when I comment the torch>=1.5.1 and torchvision>=0.6, it works again. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
!pip install -U -r requirements.txt !git clone https://github.com/NVIDIA/apex && cd apex && pip install -v --no-cache-dir --global-option="--cpp_ext" --global-option="--cuda_ext" . --user && cd .. && rm -rf apex
